en.title: FE Welcomes Overseas Leaders At HQ 07th August 2009! (1)
en.content:
Around 300 of FE's overseas leaders and guests visited FE's HQ on Friday 07th August 2009 and enjoyed lunch with FE's Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee. The leaders were from many countries including Indonesia, Thailand, Philippines, USA, Middle East, Pakistan, Hawaii, etc. Among the visitors was Prof. Dr. WD Astana, former Minister of Human Rights, Indonesia who was very impressed with FE's achievements and culture of helping poor and needy children of this world.

After the lunch, there was a talk by Paul, who shared FE's Success, Vision and Direction with the audience. Paul introduced young Filipino singing prodigy, Clark Gamul who brought tears to the eyes of the audience with his beautiful rendition of "Hope For Children" a song written specially for the launch of "Hope For Children" Charity. Clark also sang "Ben", a touching song by Michael Jackson. This was followed by a BEP conducted by FE Presidential Directors Rachel Thomas and Sam Ho with PD KC Phoon sharing his success story with the audience. The FE leaders were in town to attend FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner and launch of  FE's "Hope For Children" Charity at PGRM the following day.
< Click Here For More Photos >

After the lunch, there was a talk by Paul, who shared FE's Success, Vision and Direction with the audience. Paul introduced young Filipino singing prodigy, Clark Gamul who brought tears to the eyes of the audience with his beautiful rendition of "Hope For Children" a song written specially for the launch of "Hope For Children" Charity. Clark also sang "Ben", a touching song by Michael Jackson. This was followed by a BEP conducted by FE Presidential Directors Rachel Thomas and Sam Ho with PD KC Phoon sharing his success story with the audience. The FE leaders were in town to attend FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner and launch of FE's "Hope For Children" Charity at PGRM the following day.
meta.author: klhunter
